content.html: My timeline has again a day of manager bashing. ☹️ Protip: management dysfunctions are a symptom of the system, not an issue of bad managers. If you expect managers to fix things, you do not think in systems.
content.value:
My timeline has again a day of manager bashing. ☹️

Protip: management dysfunctions are a symptom of the system, not an issue of bad managers. If you expect managers to fix things, you do not think in systems.
